author: mikemakesmusic
title: Nice throwback to Christmases past
review:
What a great way to get your Christmas tree!

Apparently, this was a freebie offer with qualifying purchase during the 2013 Christmas season.  My wife bought the set from eBay and I'm glad she did!  

Box/Instructions

Nothing special here.  Lives up to LEGO's standards.

Parts

Standard fare.  No new parts that I can tell.  However, the color scheme is very nice and the truck looks great.  

Minifigures

The minifig is a grey haired fella (like me!) with nice blue/gray coveralls.  He wheels the handtruck around nicely and the two fit together very well.

The build

The truck uses a technique for vehicles that I haven't seen before or since.  It truly is built up.  There are no formed chassis parts except for the axles.  I like that the truck is a true brick build and not just a chassis assembly.  The grill is very attractive and fun to build using the SNOT (Studs Not On Top) technique.  The truck rolls effortlessly.  I very much enjoy this build.

The completed model

Nice lines, proportions and colors.  Looks great when completed!  

Overall opinion

A great addition to any Christmas collection. Highly recommended.
